class MarioAgent:
    def __init__(self):
        self.lives = 3
        self.power_state = "small"
        self.experience_replay = []
        self.princess_saved_count = 0
        
    def collect_reward(self, item):
        if item == "coin":
            self.score += 100
            self.experience_replay.append(("coin", 100))
        elif item == "mushroom":
            self.power_state = "super"
            self.experience_replay.append(("power_up", 1000))
        elif item == "star":
            self.invincible = True
            self.experience_replay.append(("invincibility", 5000))
            
    def navigate_pipe(self, pipe_network):
        # Mama mia! It's like navigating neural network layers!
        return self.find_optimal_path(pipe_network)
        
    def jump_on_goomba(self, enemy):
        # Pattern recognition and response!
        if self.can_defeat(enemy):
            return self.execute_action("jump")
        else:
            return self.execute_action("dodge")

class MarioMultiAgentSystem:
